pv37:20.3: vaggu ca susaṅgato ca → vaggu sumukho susaṃgato (bj) | vaggū ca susaṅgato ca (sya1ed, sya2ed)
pv37:35.1: ca sirīsavanā → ime sirisūpavanā ca (bj) | ime sirisapavanā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | ime pi sirīsavanā ca (pts-vp-pli2ed, mr)
pv37:52.2: purakkhatvā → purakkhipitvā (bj, pts-vp-pli2ed) | purakkhitvā (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
